description: Ms. codex. Incipit: ... نحمدك اللهم يا من هدانا بانوار القران والحديث لمعرفة الفرائض والسنن
author: Fayḍ al-Kāshī, Muḥammad ibn Murtaḍá, 1598 or 1599-1680 or 1681
abstract: Collection of Shiʻite traditions, comprising books 1-4 in two volumes (kitāb al-ʻaql wa-al-ʻilm, kitāb al-ḥujjah, kitāb al-īmān wa-al-kufr, kitāb al-ṭahārah).
extent: 2 volumes (306, 274) leaves : paper ; 240 x 175 (177 x 117) mm
title: al-Wāfī.
creator: فيض الكاشي، محمد بن مرتضى، 1598 or 1599-1680 or 1681
subject: Hadith (Shiites)—Early works to 1800
member of collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
